landing.tags: Roguelite - Challenging turn base RPG - Deep strategy - Pixel art ✨
landing.description: Dragged into a fractured reality, you face relentless trials in a rogue-lite adventure where every run shapes your legend. Battle otherworldly forces, adapt, and rise—or be lost to the echoes of a crumbling world.

dialogs.title: Recruit your Ultimate Team
dialogs.subTitle: Step into a roguelite where every encounter matters. Engage in meaningful dialogues, unlock cinematic moments, and recruit a diverse cast of characters to join your adventure. Your choices shape your team and your destiny: forge powerful bonds, face epic battles, and uncover the secrets of a world full of surprises. Will you rise to the challenge and create your legend?

fight.title: Strategy Above All
fight.subTitle: In this turn-based combat mode, there's no room for improvisation. Each turn is a puzzle where every decision matters. Analyze the situation, plan your moves, and exploit your enemies' weaknesses with precise tactics. Master the strategy to lead your team to victory!

cityWalk.title: Clairval: The Lost Village
cityWalk.subTitle: Explore a lively town, a forgotten crossroads of destinies, inhabited by NPCs with deep stories, merchants offering rare artifacts, and mysterious events that reshape your journey with every playthrough.

roguePath.title: At the Crossroads of Choices
roguePath.subTitle: Battle, encounter, mini-game, or reward? Each path holds an opportunity... or a danger. Your destiny lies in your hands.
